text: Egha bizir kabar gɨn Ekiam 72plan gumazir igharaziba mɨsevegha pumuning pumuning faragh nguibar ekiaba ko danganir a mangasa nɨghnɨzibar me amadi.10:1 Fofozir gumazir avɨriba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, gumazir Iesus amadazibar dɨbobonim, a 72 puvatɨ. Me ghaze, men dɨbobonim 70ra. Eghtɨ namba 70, a Luk 10:1ɨn ikɨtɨ, eghtɨ Luk 10:17 uaghan, namba 70 an ikɨ.
